LibSF Arxoda -- Oppie-6+ Core Register State                                                                                                                            Nov.25.2016
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Note:  This document is incomplete, other changes have been made which are not reflected here, observe all of the documentation and comp.arch posts for the comprehensive picture]

KERNEL REGISTERS:
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tsp     Task Stack Pointer
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  ts      Task Selector
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr      Task Register
		                                                                               
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  gdt     (limit:base)
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  idt     (limit:base)
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  ldt     (selector in gdt)
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  integrity
		                                                                               
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr7	TLB 1
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr6	TLB 0
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr5	Cache 3
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr4    Cache 2
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr3	Cache 1
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr2	Cache 0
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr1	Parity
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  tr0	Monitor

	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr7
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr6
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr5
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr4     Debug registers
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr3
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr2
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr1
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  dr0
		                                                        
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr7
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr6
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr5
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr4     Control registers
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr3
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr2
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr1
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cr0

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
APPLICATION REGISTERS:
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wflags
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wflagsp
		                                                        
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wax
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wcx
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wdx
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wbx
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wsp
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wbp
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wsi
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wdi
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wspp
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  wbpp

	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  cs
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  ss
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  ps

	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  ds
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  es
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  fs

	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w23

	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w30
		                                                        
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w31
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w32
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w33
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w34
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w35
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w36
		                                                        
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w37
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w38
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w39
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w40
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w41
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w42
		                                                        
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w43
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w44
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w45
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w46
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w47
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w48
		                                                        
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w49
	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w50

	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w52

	|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|00000000|  w60
